casebody.data:
Hall
v.
Sison 433P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Steven James Hall, For Hall, Steven James.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2016 by Plaintiff for Court Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
